definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: We would like to, every street lamp power distribution cabinet to send a person on duty, is not realistic.
sentences.chinese: 我們想，每個路燈配電櫃派一個人值班，是不現實的。

sentences.english: Clean the distribution room and electric closet regularly.
sentences.chinese: 按照計劃，定期清掃配電室及樓層配電櫃。
